pages.text: Shops must be $(l)approved$() to build within the shopping districts.$(br2)All shops must follow the following rules:$(br)$(li)Shops must have a visible sign with your name and the last date you checked your shop

$(li)Shops must have a clear, specific theme. Theme defines the atmosphere of your shop as well as the types of items sold.$(br2)$(o)This idea is to avoid having 'Some Mod: The Shop' and leave space for others to make shops$()!
$(li)No continuous machines (must have on/off)$(br)$(li)Minimal particle effects$(br)$(li)Use apple crates or have signage dictating prices$(br)$(li)No megabuilds
$(li)$(l)Do not claim any chunks$()$(br)$(li)You may have one (1) live entity in your build - $(l)NO Villagers$()$(br)$(li)Fairy lights entities are allowed, but please use them sparingly
